annotation.text: The optimum pH for the hydrolysis of pNPP, PPi, and ATP by osteoblast-derived membrane-bound TNAP and liposome-reconstituted osteoblast-derived TNAP was 10, 9, and 9.5, respectively (not shown).
Hence, Table 2 summarizes the results for the catalysis by osteoblast-derived TNAP, analyzed as native membrane-bound enzyme and as reconstituted enzyme in the various proteoliposomes.
